Text: Hawkes Peers CoJeff I hope you are well Below is a background on our firm As you will see what characterizes our candidates is their current or recent experiences Many have already rolled out into industry as well HawkesPeers Co is an executive search firm based in NYC specializing in identifying opportunities for toptier consultants from the top strategy firmsMcKinsey Bain BCG AT Kearney and Booz Allen who are looking to move into the corporate sector These candidates also share the common qualification of an MBA from one of the elite business schools such as Harvard Wharton Sloan Kellogg etc Our focus targets this network of individuals on an ongoing basis keeping an active portfolio of these management consultants from which we can draw for appropriate opportunities The emergence growth and continued vitality of HawkesPeers are a direct result of the increased demand for strategy consulting professionals throughout the United States Our intent is to identify and reposition only those professionals who will enhance and build quality organizations and to adhere to high professional and ethical standards that serve the best interests of our clients and our profession Our extensive network can allow your organization to be highly selective and save you invaluable time We can give you the ability to select amongst the most talented strategic operations and management consulting professionals and build strength in the future of your company If you have an interest in the pool of talent that we represent I would be more than happy to provide you with more information Additionally I can send samples of our past introductions as well as resumes provided with permission from the candidate Sincerely Georgette Semaan Hawkes Peers Co

Hawkes Peers CoHello Jeff Regardless of the present state of Wall Street and the rest of the US economy the choke point in business growth today isand will continue to betalent rather than capital HawkesPeers Co is an executive search firm based in NYC What characterizes our candidates is their current and recent experiences We specialize in identifying opportunities for toptier consultants from the premier strategy firmsMcKinsey Bain BCG AT Kearney and Booz Allenwho have either rolled out into industry or are looking to move into the corporate sector These candidates also share the qualification of an MBA from one of the elite business schools Harvard Wharton Sloan Stanford or Kellogg We target this group of individuals on an ongoing basis maintaining an active dialogue with them so we know exactly whom to identify for appropriate opportunities Our network allows your organization to be highly selective while saving invaluable time You pick and choose among the most talented strategic operations and management consulting professionals they build the future strength of your company If you have an interest in the pool of talent we represent I would be happy to provide you with more information I can also send samples of our past introductions as well as resumes provided with the candidates permission Please let us know if theres any way we can help you Sincerely Georgette Semaan Hawkes Peers Co
